name: Pop Menus for WP-Admin
author: Foxinni

sections.description:
Start saving time now. Make use of this lightwieght and simple Pop Menu plugin for the new WP-Admin backend.

Benifits:

  • Saves time.
  • Saves space.
  • Improves usability.
  • Acess to any menus on demand.
  • Unobtrusive code.
  • Created with the jQuery library

Known Bugs:

  • Page must be refreshed if menu is collapsed/folded.
  • IE6 – Menus go under Select Boxes and some hover issues.
  • IE – No fixed menu for Intenet Explorer
  • Still to be tested with Opera
sections.installation:
1. Upload pop_menus.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Start using the Wp-Admin Sidebar and see the pop menus at work.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Made more compatible with IE6 and IE7.
  • Added position:fixed to #adminmenu for Cool browsers

1.0

  • First Release!

short_description: Menus for your WP-Admin sidebar that will save you time. Powered by jQuery and CSS.
description:
Start saving time now. Make use of this lightwieght and simple Pop Menu plugin for the new WP-Admin backend.

Also compatible when menu is collapsed.
